bio: Experienced and impact-driven Senior Frontend Developer with 5+ years delivering scalable, high performance web and cross-platform applications using Angular, Ionic, and Electron.

Proven ability to lead frontend architecture, optimize UI performance, and mentor developers across enterprise environments. Skilled in integrating AI-enhanced tools like GitHub Copilot and Cursor to accelerate development workflows.
Strong communication and analytical skills gained through direct client interaction and leading product revamps. Passionate about clean code, user-focused design, and continuous growth.
Now seeking senior-level or lead frontend roles in innovative, global tech teams where I can drive scalable frontend architecture and mentor high-performing developers.
